name: Duke Nuke's Quest
description:
So, do you think you're strong enough to handle this journey? If your answer is yes, let me prove you wrong!

The game features:

  • In Depth Voice Acting
  • Detailed Character Development
  • Outstanding 4K Graphics
  • Incredible Gameplay and RPG Mechanics

If you're still not sold, I doubt you're a human.

Although, to be honest, the game is quite short, so updates are planned after the game's release.

The game can simply be downloaded by running the setup file and then searching for it in the search bar.

If you need more help on the game (or find a bug), contact me on my Discord: "Big Strong Hero#3505" (Without Quotation Marks)
